sense.gloss: as a result of ..., as a consequence of ..., after ..., following ...
effects (e.g. sound effects, visual effects, special effects)
x: 音響効果・おんきょうこうか・1

sense.gloss: (good) result, outcome, fruits (of one's labors), product, accomplishment
as was expected, just as one thought, sure enough
to accomplish, to achieve, to carry out, to fulfill, to fulfil, to realize, to execute, to perform, to do
to do ... completely, to do ... entirely
the end, the extremity, the limit, the limits, the result

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑評論↑↓ひょうろん↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓の↑表面↑↓ひょうめん↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑分析↑↓ぶんせき↓↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げていただけだったのでクラスで↑最↑↓さい↓↑上位↑↓じょうい↓の↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑得↑↓え↓たことにとても↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いた。
sdata.e: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑義務↑↓ぎむ↓を↑果↑↓は↓たすべきだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑義務↑↓ぎむ↓を↑果↑↓は↓たすべきである。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑役割↑↓やくわり↓を↑果↑↓は↓たせ、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はその↑他↑↓た↓の↑事↑↓こと↓をやる。
sdata.e: You do your part and I'll do the rest.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑果物↑↓くだもの↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はなぜお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑使↑↓つか↓い↑果↑↓は↓たしたのか。
sdata.e: Why did you use up all the money?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなぜお↑金↑↓かね↓をすべて↑使↑↓つか↓い↑果↑↓は↓たしたのか。
sdata.e: Why did you use up all the money?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑説明↑↓せつめい↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: You have to account for the result.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑上役↑↓うわやく↓に↑知↑↓し↓らせなくてはならない。
sdata.e: You must inform your superior of the results.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑甘受↑↓かんじゅ↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should abide by the consequences.

words.gloss: (good) result, outcome, fruits (of one's labors), product, accomplishment
